description: Research dissertation on issues in multimedia design or design computing. Specific topics decided in consultation with a supervisor. Topics may cover historical & prospective design & use of design computing technologies, as well as functional, social, aesthetic, & technical issues. Students commencing in semester 1 enrol in DECO6801 in both semesters 1 and 2, students commencing in semester 2 enrol in DECO6802 in semester 2 and the following semester 1.
